      • getTempResourceRoots

        public def getTempResourceRoots() : List<String> 
        Description copied from class: DynamicValidationContext
        Replies the temprary root folders for resources.

        The temporary resources are forgiven as soon as this function is called.

        Returns:
        the root folders.

      • setTempResourceRoots

        public def setTempResourceRoots(roots : List<String>) : void 
        Description copied from class: DynamicValidationContext
        Change the root folders for resources.

        The temporary resources are forgiven as soon as the function DynamicValidationContext.getTempResourceRoots() is called.

        Parameters:
        roots - the root folders.

      • appendFileExistenceTest

        public def appendFileExistenceTest(receiver : org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.compiler.output.ITreeAppendable,
                                   relativeFile : File,
                                   errorLabel : String) : void 
        Description copied from class: DynamicValidationContext
        Append to the given receiver the code for testing the existence of a file.
        Parameters:
        receiver - the receiver.
        relativeFile - the filename to test.
        errorLabel - the label to be output when the file was not found.

      • appendFileExistenceTest

        public def appendFileExistenceTest(receiver : org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.compiler.output.ITreeAppendable,
                                   relativeFile : File,
                                   errorLabel : String,
                                   extensions : Iterable<String>) : void 
        Description copied from class: DynamicValidationContext
        Append to the given receiver the code for testing the existence of a file.
        Parameters:
        receiver - the receiver.
        relativeFile - the filename to test.
        errorLabel - the label to be output when the file was not found.
        extensions - the file extensions to be considered as equivalent.

      • appendTitleAnchorExistenceTest

        public def appendTitleAnchorExistenceTest(receiver : org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.compiler.output.ITreeAppendable,
                                          relativeFile : File,
                                          anchor : String,
                                          sectionPatternSpecification : String,
                                          extensions : Iterable<String>) : void 
        Description copied from class: DynamicValidationContext
        Append to the given receiver the code for testing the existence of an title anchor.
        Parameters:
        receiver - the receiver.
        relativeFile - the filename to test.
        anchor - the name of the title reference.
        sectionPatternSpecification - the regular expression for extracting a title from the file content.
        extensions - the file extensions to be considered as equivalent.
